link.label: Tracker Livestock Business Intelligence Toolkit
link.text: Find out about the Tracker Livestock Business Intelligence Toolkit

group.text:
When previewing the Tracker BI Toolkit please keep the following in mind:
  • This is a Beta release of the Tracker BI Toolkit.
  • The Tracker BI Toolkit beta releases are consider pre-production releases.
  • The Beta releases of Tracker BI Toolkit are intended for demonstration and testing for beta customer and project sponsors only.

The Tracker BI Toolkit is a provisioning enabled Eclipse Rich Client Platform Product:
  • The Tracker BI Toolkit utilizes inter-network based component repositories to install and update software.
  • When the Tracker archive is initially downloaded and installed, the Tracker Desktop Toolkit contains no Tracker tool features.
  • To utilize Tracker BI tool solutions, these tool features will have to be provisioned by the user from network based component repositories.
